wibhishanasarasaya uu gugode inna pakek kiyala piligannawa.pka awulak na pka uuge ayithiya.wade kiyanne mu laksha 62 saha dan eetath wadi pirisata mu inna gu walata bahinna kiyala katha nathuwa aaradanakarana pakayi hirikithe.mahindage gu suwimin pulpake pina pina nana gaman supurudu napunsaka shayilayen,''mahindage gu mara sapayi happa oyalath bahinnako ayiya'' kiyana napunsaka patiyek hara wena rupakayak matanam sarasayagen sihiwanne natha.sarasaya surathanthayata pathwane mahindaya rajata aadala heluwen widisancharaya karanakota wenna puluwan.habayi pka uu wage kipadenekta aathal unata bahutharayata sithambara patasalu aadi maranam hirikithaya.1994 sita 2005 dakwa chandrikatath baye natta puke gahagena siti mahindaya welawakata sarasayatath wada sthrilakshanadariyeku yayi mata sithe.

bandhanagara rohale waidyawarayage nirdeshayakata anuwa ee mahathata sidu kirimata niyamitha waidya parikshanayak sandaha melesa rohal gathakala bawath bandhanagara niladharinge aarakshawa yatathe jathika rohale gewana wattuwe basil rajapaksha mahatha pa්rathikara labana bawath jathika rohale aaranchimarga sandahan kaleya.

warthamanaye siduwana mudal wishuddhikaranaya ha tha්rasthawadinta mudal sapayima sadaha anugamanaya kerena ka්ramawedayan saha ehi athi awadanam thaththwayan sambandhayen siya samajika ratawal saha mahajanathawa danuwath kirima sadaha thakshanika sahaya, puhunuwim saha upaya marga adhyayanaya kirimata awasthawa labadima magin da mema kandayama siya samajika ratawalata sahaya laba deyi. 2016-2018 warshayan sadaha mudal wishuddhikaranaya pilibada aasiya shanthikara kalapiya kandayame saha sabhapathithwaya shi්ra lankawa wisin darana bawin mewara warshika samuluwa shi්ra lankawata athishayan wadagath we.

pa්rabuddhathwaya thulin manawa samajaya kotharam ihala abhiwruddhiyak athpath karagaththada deshapalana, aarthika, samajiya ha sanskruthika parimandalayan wasa pathira athi pa්rachandathwaya jayaganimata manawa samajayanta nohakiwi athi bawa aithihasika yatharthayaki.
dan maranthika ‘blu wel’ ena awadanama pathitha wemin thibenuye ewan antharjala samajayakata ya.
krikat loka kusalanaya atha langa thabagena me natana pissuwa nam nathara kara damiya yuthuya.

luk 14 onlayin bayibalaya | nawa lowa pariwarthanaya luk 14:1-35 14 yesus sabath dawasakadi parisiwarun athara siti pradhaniyekuge niwase thibu bhojana sangrahayakata giyeya.+ ehi siti siyaludenama ohu desa bala sitiye mahath wimasillakini.+ 2 me athara sirura idimi rogathurawa* siti ekthara minisek ohu idiriyehi sitiyeya. 3 ohuwa dutu yesus nithiya gana mana danumak athi ayagen saha parisiwarungen mese asuweya.

rajarata iskolekata illagena maruwak ragena gos guruwarayaku guru upadeshakawarayaku saha wada balana adhyapana adhyakshakawarayaku lesa ma hangi sewayak kala chandradasa wijesundara iskole mahaththaya gana gewunu irida apa ki katha obata amathaka wannata hatiyakma natha. di. es. senanayakayan maha russa wananthara eli peheli karamin gowi janapada godanagu yugayaka kathandara ee iskole mahaththaya asuweda ehi giya samayedimaya.

awurudu pahen pahata digatama thiyagena aapu maha chande 1975 awurudde thibbe na. 1972 aluth aandukrama wyawasthawak sammatha karagaththu nisa aanduwe nila kalaya ganan ganne 1972 indala awurudu pahakya kiyala kolwin goyiya genapu kakille tharkayak piliaragena ( kolwiyage ara goyan koleta muwa wela wedi thiyapu kathandare ehema aththamado kiyala hithenne welawakata manussayage ee wage katha hinda thamayi ) sirimakka karapu wade 1975 thiyanda oona chande awurudu dekak kaldagaththa.
eeth meka thama yatharthaya.
eeta pilithuruda dewidunma laba de.
aagama dahama kiyanne jathikathwaya wagema hodata wikunannata puluwan ithama labha upadawana margayak.
mokada mehe thiyana me wage surya balasamagam bohomayakata nisi kramawedayak naha.
